verses.text_uthmani: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلْمَلِكِ ٱلْقُدُّوسِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':609'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَمَا فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13591'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلِكِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13592'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُدُّوسِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13593'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَزِيزِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2229'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yusabbiḥu lillāhi mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍil-malikil-quddūsil-'azīzil-ḥakīm(i).
verses.translation: Все в небесах и на земле Хвалу и славу воздает Аллаху - (Верховному) Царю, Святому, Мудрейшему и Мощному (над всем)

verses.text_uthmani: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى بَعَثَ فِى ٱلْأُمِّيِّـۧنَ رَسُولًا مِّنْهُمْ يَتْلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَيُزَكِّيهِمْ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَإِن كَانُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ لَفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':153'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى بَعَثَ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2033'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>ِيِّـ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـۧ</tajweed>نَ رَسُول<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':677'>اً م</tajweed>ِّنْهُمْ يَتْلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> وَيُزَكِّيهِمْ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':678'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بَ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':679'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحِكْمَةَ وَإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2392'>ن ك</tajweed>َانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':128'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':129'>بْ</tajweed>لُ لَفِى ضَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':2393'>لٍ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Huwal-lażī ba'aṡa fil-ummiyyīna rasūlam minhum yatlū 'alaihim āyātihī wa yuzakkīhim wa yu'allimuhumul-kitāba wal-ḥikmata wa in kānū min qablu lafī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
verses.translation: Он средь невежд избрал посланника для них, Кто им Его знамения толкует, Чтобы очистить их и обучить Священному Письму и мудрости (Господней), - (Хотя еще совсем недавно) Они, поистине, (в земных) грехах блуждали

verses.text_uthmani: وَءَاخَرِينَ مِنْهُمْ لَمَّا يَلْحَقُوا۟ بِهِمْ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَءَاخَرِينَ مِنْهُمْ لَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا يَلْحَقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِهِمْ‌ۚ وَهُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7045'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَزِيزُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':681'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ākharīna minhum lammā yalḥaqū bihim, wa huwal-'azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
verses.translation: А равно и для тех, Кто к ним пока не примыкает. Ведь Он могущества и мудрости исполнен

verses.text_uthmani: ذَٰلِكَ فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ فَضْلُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':337'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':476'>َن ي</tajweed>َش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ ذُو <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':550'>ٱ</tajweed>لْفَضْلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':551'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Żālika faḍlullāhi yu'tīhi may yasyā'(u), wallāhu żul-faḍlil-'aẓīm(i).
verses.translation: Вот такова Господня милость, И Он дарует ее всем, кому сочтет. Ведь Он - Владыка милости великой

verses.text_uthmani: مَثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ حُمِّلُوا۟ ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةَ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَحْمِلُوهَا كَمَثَلِ ٱلْحِمَارِ يَحْمِلُ أَسْفَارًۢا ۚ بِئْسَ مَثَلُ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مَثَلُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1179'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ حُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>ِلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13594'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>تَّوْرَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>ةَ ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ لَمْ يَحْمِلُوهَا كَمَثَلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13595'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحِمَارِ يَحْمِلُ أَسْفَار<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13596'>َۢا‌ۚ ب</tajweed>ِئْسَ مَثَلُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5140'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَوْمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4053'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِـَٔـايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':322'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1504'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَوْمَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1505'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ظَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Maṡalul-lażīna ḥummilut-taurāta ṡumma lam yaḥmilūhā kamaṡalil-ḥimāri yaḥmilu asfārā(n), bi'sa maṡalul-qaumil-lażīna każżabū bi'āyātillāh(i), wallāhu lā yahdil-qaumaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
verses.translation: Ослу, что тащит груз тяжелых книг, (Но смысл того, что в них, не понимает), Подобны те, кому было доверено нести (Святую) Тору, - Они ж пренебрегли ее Заветом. И мерзости подобны те, Которые сочли за ложь знамения Аллаха. Неправедных не поведет Аллах по верному пути

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوٓا۟ إِن زَعَمْتُمْ أَنَّكُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ لِلَّهِ مِن دُونِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُا۟ ٱلْمَوْتَ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':541'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ هَاد<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13597'>ن ز</tajweed>َعَمْتُمْ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكُمْ أَوْلِي<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ لِلَّهِ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':107'>ن د</tajweed>ُونِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':493'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسِ فَتَمَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َوُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':494'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَوْتَ إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':109'>ن ك</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul yā ayyuhal-lażīna hādū in za'amtum annakum auliyā'u lillāhi min dūnin-nāsi fa tamannawul-mauta in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
verses.translation: Скажи: "О вы, кто предались иудаизму! Коль вы считаете, что вы близки к Аллаху, Как избранные из других людей, Так пожелайте себе скорой смерти, (Которая приблизит вас к Нему), Если правдивы вы (в своих словах)

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَا يَتَمَنَّوْنَهُۥٓ أَبَدًۢا بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَا يَتَمَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َوْنَهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> أَبَد<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':496'>َۢا ب</tajweed>ِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ‌ۚ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ عَلِي<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':497'>مُۢ ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':498'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ظَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lā yatamannaunahū abadam bimā qaddamat aidīhim, wallāhu 'alīmum biẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
verses.translation: Но никогда они ее не пожелают Из-за тех дел, что предварили им Их собственные руки, - Аллах ведь знает тех, кто зло творит

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْمَوْتَ ٱلَّذِى تَفِرُّونَ مِنْهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ مُلَـٰقِيكُمْ ۖ ثُمَّ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13598'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَوْتَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13599'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى تَفِرُّونَ مِنْهُ فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مُلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>قِيكُمْ‌ۖ ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5788'>ٱ</tajweed>لْغَيْبِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4187'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّهَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُك<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':3605'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِمَا كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تَعْمَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul innal-mautal-lażī tafirrūna minhu fa innahū mulāqīkum ṡumma turaddūna ilā 'ālimil-gaibi wasy-syahādati fa yunabbi'ukum bimā kuntum ta'malūn(a).
verses.translation: Скажи: "Смерть, от которой вы бежите, (Со временем) настигнет вас, И вас вернут к Тому, Кто знает Все, что сокрыто и что явно; И обо всем, что совершили вы, Он вам напомнит (в этот День)

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا نُودِىَ لِلصَّلَوٰةِ مِن يَوْمِ ٱلْجُمُعَةِ فَٱسْعَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ وَذَرُوا۟ ٱلْبَيْعَ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':541'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِذَا نُودِىَ لِلصَّلَ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٲ</tajweed>ةِ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13600'>ِن ي</tajweed>َوْمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13601'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجُمُعَةِ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13602'>ٱ</tajweed>سْعَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3774'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ وَذَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13603'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَيْعَ‌ۚ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكُمْ خَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':263'>رٌ ل</tajweed>َّكُمْ إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':109'>ن ك</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū iżā nūdiya liṣ-ṣalāti miy yaumil-jumu'ati fas'au ilā żikrillāhi wa żarul-bai'(a), żālikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: О вы, кто верует! Когда вас позовут к молитве дня собранья, Спешите к поминанию Аллаха. Оставьте все торговые дела, - Для вас так будет лучше. О, если бы вы только знали

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِذَا قُضِيَتِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةُ فَٱنتَشِرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱبْتَغُوا۟ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَإِذَا قُضِيَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13604'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّلَ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٲ</tajweed>ةُ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':10874'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':10874'>نت</tajweed>َشِرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':988'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':988'>بْ</tajweed>تَغُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6655'>ن ف</tajweed>َضْلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6656'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':335'>ٱ</tajweed>ذْكُرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1113'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ كَثِي<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':5368'>رًا ل</tajweed>َّعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa iżā quḍiyatiṣ-ṣalātu fantasyirū fil-arḍi wabtagū min faḍlillāhi ważkurullāha kaṡīral la'allakum tufliḥūn(a).
verses.translation: Когда ж молитва завершится, Вы в поисках даров Господних Идите по земле, куда угодно вам, И часто славьте имя Бога, - Чтобы могли успех вы обрести и радость в жизни". (Совету ж твоему не следуют они)

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا۟ تِجَـٰرَةً أَوْ لَهْوًا ٱنفَضُّوٓا۟ إِلَيْهَا وَتَرَكُوكَ قَآئِمًا ۚ قُلْ مَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيْرٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهْوِ وَمِنَ ٱلتِّجَـٰرَةِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا رَأَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> تِجَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رَةً أَوْ لَهْوًا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13605'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13606'>نف</tajweed>َضّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِلَيْهَا وَتَرَكُوكَ ق<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13607'>مًا‌ۚ ق</tajweed>ُلْ مَا عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':264'>ند</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':408'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ خَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13608'>رٌ م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13609'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>لَّهْوِ وَمِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13610'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>تِّجَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رَةِ‌ۚ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ خَيْرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3894'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>زِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa iżā ra'au tijāratan au lahwaninfaḍḍū ilaihā wa tarakūka qā'imā(n), qul mā 'indallāhi khairum minal-lahwi wa minat-tijārah(ti), wallāhu khairur-rāziqīn(a).
verses.translation: Едва увидев торг иль легкую забаву, Они тотчас бросаются туда, Тебя оставив (проповедь читать), стоящим одиноко. Скажи: "То, что Аллахом уготовано для вас, Дороже всех забав и тОргов. И лучше всех Он Свой удел распределяет
